translation.intro-text: DA ServePro application helps store owners and employees track sales activities effectively anytime, anywhere. Suitable for all business types from F&B, retail to services.
translation.feature1-text: Minimalist interface, fast operation, create orders in just 3 seconds
translation.feature2-text: Real-time order status tracking across all devices
translation.feature3-text: Automatically summarize revenue, orders, best-selling items in real time
translation.feature4-text: Set specific roles and permissions for each employee
translation.feature5-text: Data is continuously synced and securely stored
translation.feature6-text: 2-layer data encryption, only account owner has access rights
translation.contact-text: For any inquiries or support requests, please contact:
translation.address: Address: 52 D1 Street, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, HCMC
